Posts.Content: Hi. I was diagnosed with Lymphoma 2 years ago. I decided to play it down so no one would worry too much about me. I couldn't do the face to face "sit down, I've got something to tell you" thing and watch them struggling to react. So I sent them all a text reading "Hi, been diagnosed with lymphoma but not too worried as doctor says lymphoma is treatable so just waiting for appointment for treatment. I feel fine so no big deal." It worked.
Posts.Title: How to tell friends?
